title: SV, Koi no Shinchoku ni Tsuite.
synopsis:
Yonemura, a supervisor of a convenience store, and his boyfriend Andou, a cheeky part-timer who's over ten years younger, are not in an intimate relationship yet. But soon, Andou will celebrate his 20th birthday, so Yonemura is secretly planning something. Due to Yonemura's busy schedule, they can barely see each other. Then enters Mitsuhara, a new part-timer who can't seem to control his hands around Yonemura. Problems start to rise between the three!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Ashley Goeth no Yukue

alternative_titles.ja: アシュリー＝ゲートの行方

synopsis:
After receiving a heart transplant, Haru Inoue finds himself with memories that do not belong to him. For days, he has been dreaming about the same scenario: a bus ride and an unfamiliar girl sitting across him. Initially, Haru brushes it off as a case of inherited memories, until another patient catches his attention by screaming for help and fighting the hospital staff. The strange incident sets off a chain of events that reveals something more sinister than Haru could have ever imagined.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Sekai Seifuku: Junketsu no White Light

alternative_titles.ja: 世界征服～純潔のホワイトライト～

synopsis: Spin-off of Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda.

title: Kimi no Ondo
synopsis: Mizumo Hiraga is providing sex for money to bring up his brothers. The Otunari family have always been tender for the Hiraga\'s, like parents. Minori Otunari finds out Mizumo\'s dirty business and offers to pay in order to have sex with Mizumo. Their distorted physical relationship starts in this way, but Minori begins to love Mizumo seriously... (Baka Updates)

title: Midara na Sasayaki
synopsis:
Coworkers Ryuuichi and Haruyoshi are dating, but now Ryuuchi's working all hours.

(Source: MU)

title: Gyokou no Nikuko-chan
synopsis:
The story centers on the growth and paths in the life of Nikuko and Kikuko, a mother and daughter who lives on a boat.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Amefuru Aru Hi no Isekai de

synonyms: A Trip to a Different World on a Rainy Day
alternative_titles.ja: 雨降るある日の異世界で

synopsis:
On a certain rainy day, high schooler Kotori Izumi jumps into a rain puddle, which turns out to be connected to another world. Can she resolve the ongoing conflict that involves rain?

(Source: Bushiroad Creative, translated)

title: Anmitsu no Ippai♥Cosu tte Ageru

alternative_titles.ja: アンミツのいっパイ♥コスってあげる

synopsis: Included one-shot: Kaikan!? Pocharinko

title: RPG Comic
synopsis:
After a falling out with his team, the Guild Master of the greatest guild quits the game. As the top player, he had pioneered the creation of a unique plot item that is required to open a new area of the game. After 2 years he returns to find that his items and gold have been stolen by hackers and the unique plot item he made unavailable by leaving, was never replaced, and so he is hated by everyone in the game. Our accessories-loving hero is however very relaxed, and simply goes back to his old ways of trying to create/purchase the most interesting items.

(Source: MU)

title: Shiro Majutsushi wa Yuusha no Level wo Agetakunai

synonyms: White Magician Don't Want to Raise Hero's Level
alternative_titles.en: The White Mage Doesn't Want to Raise the Hero's Level
alternative_titles.ja: 白魔術師は勇者のレベルを上げたくない

synopsis:
Izumi Irie was summoned to a fantasy world to defeat the Demon King...but first he needs to grow more powerful. In his quest to level up his skills, he forms a party with the voluptuous white mage Sheena. If Irie triumphs against the Demon King, however, he'll return to his world—and the lovestruck Sheena has no intention of letting that happen. She'll pull out all the stops to keep him from getting stronger, including wearing sexy outfits and distracting him in the middle of battle! Will Irie ever be able to concentrate on leveling up, or will Sheena's schemes succeed?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

title: Yoru ga Owaranai
synopsis: Strange things happen around Seren who can read animals' minds. And what is and who is the mysterious "Red Eyes"? A suspense story.

title: Namaiki Daisuki!

synonyms: Nandemo Flea Market App de Kaeru Jidai
Mei to Tomodachi no Erozuke Nikki
Uchi no Imouto wa Toilet ni Ikanai

synopsis:
1. Itoko no Kateikyoushi
2. Tousatsu no Tousatsu
3. Summer Camp
4. Nandemo Flea Market App de Kaeru Jidai
5. Mei to Tomodachi no Erozuke Nikki
6. Douga no Soto de wa...
7. Futari no Warudakumi
8. Uchi no Imouto wa Toilet ni Ikanai
9. Seibutsu-bu no Tsumiko-san

title: Colorful
synopsis:
"Congratulations, you've won the lottery!" shouts the angel Prapura to a formless soul. The soul hasn't been kicked out of the cycle of rebirth just yet—he's been given a second chance. He must recall the biggest mistake of his past life while on "homestay" in the body of fourteen-year-old Makoto Kobayashi, who has just committed suicide. It looks like Makoto doesn't have a single friend, and his family don't seem to care about him at all. But as the soul begins to live Makoto's life on his own terms, he grows closer to the family and the people around him, and sees their true colors more clearly, shedding light on Makoto's misunderstandings.

(Source: Counterpoint)

title: Dragon Fist
synopsis:
The series follows Ling Fei-long, a Chinese transfer student living in Japan. Ling is the son of the leader of the White Dragon clan, one of four clans who live in the mountains of China and are descended from mythical beasts. After killing an ordinary human, Ling is banished to Japan so that he might learn about humanity and how to control his powers around them.

This particular manga has been published one volume per year for the past 12 years, so the artistic style changes rather drastically as you read further on. It's a kind of chronicle of Katayama Shuu's growth as an artist.

alternative_titles.ja: 赫竜王〈イグニス〉の盟約騎士

title: Kanashiki Ningyo
synopsis:
Umi's life has been filled with nothing but misery since he was born. Due to a hideous birthmark caused by a mermaid's curse, his family disowns him and he is treated like a monster. Everything changes when he meets Naosuke—a tattoo artist who covers his birthmark with a tattoo resembling the sea and raises him as his own child. After Naosuke's death, Umi inherits his trade, but due to his appearance, he lives secluded from everyone—his only company being his spirit guardians, the goldfish Kuro and carp Nishiki.

Mikagi makes a living as a so-called medium. In reality, he is a swindler—although he can see small spirits, he is incapable of exorcising them. When he spies Umi walking through the streets with Kuro and Nishiki, Mikagi thinks he has found a potential customer; he approaches with the promise of exorcising the fish spirits and even compliments Umi's looks. However, the flustered Umi runs away, leaving Mikagi extremely confused.

The encounter leaves the two men curious about each other, which creates an opportunity for them to overcome their pasts and find happiness together.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Watashi to Otto to Otto no Kareshi

synonyms: Me, My Husband, and My Husband's Boyfriend
alternative_titles.en: Me, My Husband & My Husband's Boyfriend

synopsis:
"I want to be loved, as a person, and as a woman." Misaki Nakamichi (35) is a teacher who has been married for 5 years to her attractive husband. She appears to have a life that many would be envious of. However, the truth is that she has been concerned about her marriage due to the lack of intimacy. Her husband only sleeps with her once a year, on the day of their wedding anniversary. As she continues to question her husband's sexual desire for her, their next anniversary arrives... and she receives a shocking confession from him!

(Source: Coamix)

title: Umizaru

synonyms: The Sea Monkey in Maritime Safety Agency

synopsis:
Umizaru, the Sea Monkey, is about the Maritime Safety Agency. The main character is Daisuke Senzaki age 19, a newbie navigation officer aboard the Nagare. He has a trauma from the past and hates to over look at lives he could save even if it means risking his own. See what kind of troubles arise and how Daisuke moves from just a navigation officer to an Umizaru!

(Source: MU)

title: Makeup wa Tada no Mahou ja Nai no Beginners

alternative_titles.en: Makeup Is Not (Just) Magic: A Manga Guide to Cosmetics and Skin Care
alternative_titles.ja: メイクはただの魔法じゃないの ビギナーズ

synopsis:
An easy-breezy makeup tutorial in manga form!

For anyone intimidated by the world of makeup, you're in luck–a former beauty consultant turned comic artist is here to walk you through it. Join the author as she breaks down the fundamentals of cosmetics and skin care, guided by common questions from her online followers! Learn the basics and develop your own signature style! The perfect illustrated how-to book for fans of makeup tutorials online.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

title: Saint

synonyms: Doyoubi ni wa Kitto Iku kara

synopsis:
16 year-old Mishima Haruhi rescued a guy drowning in Yokohama Harbor, who has no memory of who he is or how he got there. Even more mysteriously, he seems to have extremely special powers including the ability to heal others. The only clue they have to his past is a bracelet he is wearing with the number "33" inscribed, but it is not long before people threatening to take his life force them to dig deeper...

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Doyoubi ni wa Kitto Iku kara

title: One More Try!
synopsis:
Life has been anything but easy for Juin On. She is unlucky in love, finances, and career. So when she finds out that her current company has been bought out, she just takes it as another tough break. However, the company that bought out her previous one doesn't want to fire her... they want to hire her! Juin On believes her luck has finally turned until she meets the CEO of the company, Jaeheon Do. He's handsome, smart, charming... and the one person she hoped to never see again.

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: Maho Maho
synopsis:
The rave of the country right now is the superhero Magical Hop. She is a cute witch that has been solving cases all over Japan with the use of her magic. She's become an idol of the country even though no one knows anything about her. Shinjouji Hazumu's sister, Akane, is a giant Magical Hop fan. Even his best friend, Ootori, and his crush, Mononobe Komari, are infatuated with her. What none of them know is that the idol witch is actually Hazumu. He has been assigned this task by his mom and has to keep the secret while solving cases if he doesn't want everyone in the country to think he is a cross dressing pervert!

(Source: MU)

title: Kawaite Sourou
synopsis: A few days ago the eighth Tokugawa had inherited the shogunate in the midst of an unstable political situation, a striking man entered Edo. He had a shocking beauty eyes, and was so handsome that seemed to have come from an engraving. It was Kainage Mondo, the new poison taster newly employed by the family of the shogun. However, some Koga ninja had hatched a plot to attack the lives of Yoshimune and Mondo.

title: Heir to the Dragon Slayer Sword

alternative_titles.en: Heir to the Dragon Slayer Sword

synopsis:
Upon her mother's death, Jericho Hansen learns a shocking secret. Her late father, a man she never knew, was none other than the legendary dragon slayer Ezra Mibare. Not only that, but she has inherited his Dragon Slayer Sword, a fearsomely powerful blade that also talks... a lot. But when the Dragon Slayer lets it slip that her father may have produced a secret son, Jericho becomes determined to find her long-lost brother, and the journey to discover this mighty weapon's true heir begins!

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: A Marriage Alliance for Revenge
synopsis:
Empress Olivia knows happiness is the last thing she deserves, but when she finally becomes pregnant with the emperor's child, she thinks things might finally be taking a turn for the better. Alas, Olivia realizes how naive she was when her husband poisons her tea, killing both her and their unborn child. When Olivia opens her eyes again in the body of an unknown woman in the slums, she vows to take vengeance against the emperor. To do so, she forms a marriage alliance with her former fiancé, Duke Lucas Viterpan, the true heir to the empire who was deposed in a coup. Will this man and woman who had everything taken from them succeed in getting revenge?

(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Toaru Majutsu no Heavy na Zashiki Warashi ga Kantan na Satsujinki no Konkatsu Jijou

synonyms: The Circumstance Leading to a Simple Killer Princess's Marriage Was A Certain Magical Heavy Zashiki Warashi
alternative_titles.ja: とある魔術のヘヴィーな座敷童が簡単な殺人妃の婚活事情

title: Kidou Senshi Gundam 00 in those days

synonyms: Gundam 00 - Where Sky and Earth Meet
Mobile Suit Gundam 00 in those days
alternative_titles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム00 in those days

synopsis:
A collection of six short stories originally serialised in Newtype and set between and after the first and second seasons.

･ Where Earth and Sky Meet (June 2010)
(Where Emptiness and the Earth Meet/Where Space and Earth Meet)
A short focusing on Marina and the Celestial Being members following the second season finale.

･ The second birthday (July 2010)
The confrontation between the two who bear the task of guiding humanity continues.
Secrets of the past, the motivations of the Innovators, and the motivations of Ribbons Almark... on the eve of "A Wakening of the Trailblazer", memories are stirring within Veda...

･ Wanderer (November 2008)
Following the first season's finale Setsuna wanders the world and ends up in an Irish bar.

･ I'm Home (March 2008)
In the wake of the first season's climactic battle Tiera struggles to comes to terms with what happened as he attempts to bring Celestial Being back together.

･ Praise the Lord - Allelujah (2008)
After Allelujah finds himself imprisoned, his begins to think about his past.

･ The Beginning Man (2008)
Lyle thinks back on his relationship with his brother and the reasons they separated years ago.

title: Boku no Papa to Papa no Hanashi

alternative_titles.en: The Story of Me, Daddy and Daddy.
alternative_titles.ja: ぼくのパパとパパの話

synopsis:
"We're not related by blood, but we're real parents."

Now that same-sex marriage has been legalized, Nao and Ai, who have been lovers since college, decide to register their marriage and adopt a baby boy named Hiro. Nao is sensitive and cries easily, while Ai has a 'going my own way' attitude. The two polar opposites begin child-rearing while dealing with the ups-and-downs such as colic at night, the first day at a nursery school, and making friends with moms!

(Source: Libre, translated)

title: Yoru no Kouen
synopsis: A couple have sex in the park at night.

title: Dorei Onna Kyoushi Mashou no Curriculum

synonyms: Shin Dorei Onna Kyoushi Mashou no Curriculum
alternative_titles.ja: 奴隷女教師魔性のカリキュラム

synopsis:
This is the story of Fujishima-sensei and her "adventures" in dealing with the Sexual Education Committee at her school... 

(Source: BakaBT)

title: Saikyou Gamer, Isekai nite Jikkyou Play-chuu

alternative_titles.en: Strongest Gamer: Let's Play in Another World
alternative_titles.ja: 最強ゲーマー、異世界にて実況プレイ中

synopsis:
Kousaka Aoi is a young, avid gamer well-versed in all types of gaming. Down on his luck, he comes upon a suspicious job offer looking for those "proficient in games." Things were looking up, but before he knew it... he's thrown into another world! And now finds himself stuck at the bottom of a ravine with nothing but a pickaxe and shovel. At a loss of what to do, he slowly learns he can make a living in this by trading items he can craft.

What other possibilities are there in this new ever-expanding, game-like world our protagonist finds himself in!?

(Source: Sol Press)

title: Omiashi wo Koko e
synopsis: Kuzumi Mari, a shoemaker, finds herself enthralled with a passerby's legs. When she accidentally mumbles how beautiful they are, Mari finds herself staring at the owner of the legs, a crying girl. Their fateful encounter starts here.

title: Princess to Konyaku

synonyms: The Stanbury Crown, Royally Wed III

synopsis:
Was I kidnapped by an angel? While Edinburg kingdom is rocked by the disappearance of the king, Ben, a marine acting as a double for his cousin, Prince Nicholas, is kidnapped. As he lies strapped to a bed, he is met by a beautiful woman smelling of roses. Seeing guilt in her eyes, Ben is sure she's taking part in this kidnapping against her will. Whatever her circumstances, Ben vows to protect her!
Part 3 of the "Wedding of the Century Kingdom of Edinburg" 4-part miniseries!

(Source: Shojo-Manhwa Scans)

title: Yagyuu Hijouken Samon
synopsis:
After the young Shogun Tokugawa Iemitsu dismisses the famous Yagyuu Jubei from his position as his fencing instructor, he chooses Jubei's younger brother, Samon as his replacement. Samon is supposedly not as good at swordplay as his brother, but Iemitsu definitely prefers him as a companion. Will the obstacles in the path of Samon and Iemitsu's relationship prove impossible to overcome?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Momoiro Ome-Chen★
synopsis:
Science geek Yuuhi Toganou has just invented the girl of his dreams, Momo-chan! But right as he anticipates losing his virginity to his creation, gyaru girl Sara Ayanokouji interrupts him and pushes the button that activates Momo-chan. Yuuhi's creation explodes, and when the dust settles, he finds out that he and Sara have switched bodies! Sara is calm about it, saying she's always wanted to be a boy, and she has plans of doing everything it means to be a man, including sex! Will Yuuhi's former body lose its virginity before his soul does!?

(Source: Manga Rock)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Kagakushitsu no Himegoto

title: Neko Irimasen ka?
synopsis: A cat falls in love with a human who once took care of him. Wanting to stay by the young man's side, he agrees to a deal that would allow him to take human form--except in the eyes of the one he has feelings for! What will become of this love?

title: Haru no Yuki
synopsis:
"I wanted to meet him," but it's impossible.

Hiyoshi, the doctor examining Yuuto, fell in love with Yukihiko at first sight. Immediately, he confessed and asked to go out with Yukihiko in the examination room. Despite being given cold treatment, Hiyoshi still hits on him every day. Yukihiko forgives him little by little because of Hiyoshi's kindness and warmth even though he blatantly rejected Hiyoshi before. Having lost someone precious and currently living through his life protecting Yuuto, Yukihiko's couldn't be honest with his own feelings...

It's a romantic, touching, and warming love story.

(Source: MU)

alternative_titles.ja: 極黒のブリュンヒルデ The Moment

title: Kuroki le voleur - Kamen no Kaitou Shoujo

synonyms: Kuroki Re-voru - Kamen no Kaitou Shoujo
alternative_titles.ja: 黒きレ・ヴォルゥ~仮面の怪盗少女

synopsis:
It is the start of the 20th century and the Parisian commoners celebrating the Belle Époque are fascinated by the antics of the resident phantom thief Arsène Lupin. But the mask of Lupin actually belies a beautiful woman...? An epic adventure aboard a luxury liner and involving even Detective Holmes is about to unfold!

(Source: MU)

title: A.I.C.O.: Incarnation
synopsis:
Set in the near future in Japan, year 2035. A major incident was known as "Burst" which was caused by researching artificial life. A certain AI called "Matter" has eroded the Kurobe Gorge. Entering the research city, which has been called as humanity's last hope, has been prohibited by the government. Two years later, Aiko Tachibana, a 15-year-old girl who lost her family from the incident, was told by a transfer student, Yuuya Kanzaki, the truth that Aiko didn't know regarding a secret hidden within her body. The key to solve the mystery is said to be in the Primary Point, the center of Burst.

When a boy and a girl, who bears the future of humanity, meet, what will be the new truth?

(Source: MAL News)

title: Transformers: Allspark

alternative_titles.ja: トランスフォーマー オールスパーク

synopsis: A modern retelling of the Transformers Generation 1 cartoon.

title: Tetsuhai no Jan!
synopsis: An alternate universe story about Kurogane Jan, who becomes a cook and occasional player at the Sanbanchi mahjong parlor.

title: My Male Friend
synopsis:
Normal 21-year-old college student Song A Ra has been best friends for 15 years with a hot guy that catches the eye of all girls, Kyung Hoon. More comfortable hanging with him than any other girl, this is the story of love that begins with this one male friend.

(Source: MU)

title: Oshikake Maid no Shirayuki-san

alternative_titles.ja: おしかけメイドの白雪さん

synopsis:
Youichirou Tenkoku alone has had to take care of his house and younger brother Ryuunosuke after the death of his mother. To better support Youichirou and Ryuunosuke, their father, who was working abroad, had his company send a housekeeper named Shirayuki to their house. However, Shirayuki is not just a housekeeper but also a maid. How will Youichirou's life play out with this new unexpected resident?

(Source: MU)

title: Psychedelics
synopsis:
This is a series of doujinshi. As Psyche Delico says, it's not a sequel for the series mentioned/worked in them. They are self parodies of her works released as doujinshi; both hilarious and smutty.

(Source: MU)

title: Ai wa Sekai wo Sukuu no ka!?
synopsis:
In a world were the number of women being born is decreasing and it's now mainly a male society. The scientists are trying to figure out a way to bring back humanity and fix this virus. One of the famous, upper class, bright, young and handsome scientist named Mikoshiba has come to the lower class area in order to help their research due to his interest in a cute, naive but average scientist named Niino who dreams of saving the world. Mikoshiba now moved in with Niino, has a theory in which he wishes to try out. His theory is that by them having sex and sexual relations that they might able to solve the world's problem!

(Source: LuffyNoTomo)

title: Suterareta Yuusha wa Maou to Narite Shinimodoru

alternative_titles.ja: 捨てられた勇者は魔王となりて死に戻る

synopsis:
Daichi Katsuragi, a youth who had suffered through gruesome bullying, suddenly teleported into another world together with his classmates. Daichi did his best in trying to be a hero, but as he was useless even after reincarnating, he was abandoned in a Monster House to be a scapegoat. Daichi should have died. However, he rose, somehow unharmed. The ability he gained was "Revenge of the Grudgebearer." It was a unique ability, one that would revive him each and every time he died and bring him an extreme level of growth! The strongest ability in his grasp, Daichi set out to take his revenge...

(Source: Futabasha, translated)

title: Aoiro Keiyaku
synopsis:
Love starts with a burglary when art owner, Andou, has a young artist's, Kagawa Setsuyou's, masterpiece stolen from under his wing. However, he finds himself having to deal with Setsuyou's artistic whims (laugh). Setting deep in the woods, alone together in an ancient gallery... the optimal environment to enjoy Ike's artistic prowess and watch sex scenes quietly from the front row.

(Source: Nakama)

title: Guuzen ga Nokosu Mono - Kioku Senmei II

alternative_titles.ja: 偶然が残すもの 記憶鮮明2

synopsis:
Collection of 3 short stories, the first two are Please Save My Earth related, but they are standalones and spoiler free:

* PSME-Things Accidently Left Behind
* PSME-BIRTH
* Cibi-01 no YaYaYa!

title: Strawberry♥Holiday

alternative_titles.ja: ストロベリィ♥ホリデー

synopsis:
1. Strawberry♥Holiday
2. Candy♥Charm
3. Naisho no Love Chance♥ (Secret Love Chance)
4. Keetai Kanojo. (Phone Girl)
5. Biribiri Girl (Electric Girl)
6. Cheers!!

title: Maidroid
synopsis: A master decides that his sex robot is way too shameless and needs to be fixed by purchasing a "shame circuit."

title: Tategami ni I Love You

alternative_titles.en: All's Fair in Love and War
alternative_titles.ja: タテガミに愛羅武勇〈アイラビユー〉

synopsis:
At a high school full of delinquents, Leo Shishiyama, a boy who looked cute but was the best fighter, is puzzled. Takeru Kurosawa, who had constantly challenging Leo to fights that ended up in a draw, has sent him an eighth challenge letter. Leo likes winning, but he doesn't particularly like fighting, and enjoys gorging on strawberry rice cakes, his favorite snack, much more. He tries to ignore Takeru, but bumps into his beautiful little sister on the street, who shows him kindness. If he can beat Takeru, maybe he can make a move on her! Leo faces Takeru, but who comes out victorious...?

(Source: Renta!)

title: Kasho no Tsuki
synopsis:
Arimasa was a half-demon priest who cared nothing of what others thought of him. That was, until one fateful night, while on a mission to exorcise a gang of demons, he encounters Kagetsu, a clumsy cat demon who will eventually change his world, and more importantly, his views of it. 

(Source: MU)

title: Kyouran Kazoku Nikki

synonyms: The Diary of a Crazed Family

synopsis:
Thousands of years ago the God of destruction, Enka, died saying thats its child would destroy the world.Thousands of years later the potential children of Enka are found (some human, some not) and take part in the Peaceful Family Operation in order to discover who the true child of Enka is and stop them from destroying the world by teaching them the importance of family love.

The novels depict the not-so-normal life of a "family" that includes a catgirl "mother," a lion "son," a living land-combat android weapon "son," a jellyfish-like otherworldly "daughter," and a hapless 27-year-old military officer as their "father." This motley "family" was assembled as part of the Imperial Japanese Anti-Paranormal Phenomena Section's Special Operations Forces to save Earth in 2063.

(Source: ANN)

title: Odeko no Mahou
synopsis:
1. Odeko no Mahou
2. Hajimari no Uta
3. Moshimoshi.
4. Ame ni mo Makezu

title: Akuma na Juuboku
synopsis:
There is a place where anyone can be a princess, it's a Hime cafe, the place where the heartbroken Shiori meets the servant Kisaragi, Kind and cool... a real dream boy, or so she thought. But in real life he's mean and bullies her. There's even rumors about him being a former yankee as well.

He's an employee at the cafe and acts completely different at school, but while she is always being teased by the normal Kisaragi, she just can't stop her love for him... Aside from the title, it's a sweet love story for girls.

title: Leveling Up Alone
synopsis:
Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That's Hanyeol's life in a nutshell. Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support. But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he's ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: KoKkuRi-san ga Tooru
synopsis:
The KoKkuRi who draw the blood of the "Clan of Deception" consist of three women—Ko (fox), Ku (Dog), and Ri (Badger)—with Rikako Oomori at the center. They go to the windy town of Shinjuku for a showdown against a motley crowd of apparitions that eat nests.

(Source: MU)

title: Cold Fever
synopsis:
Toru lost most of his memory in an accident, and can't remember anything that happened from the past six years. He feels as if he is a different person now, and he hates "the other guy"—the person he was six years ago. Miserable and emotionally drained, Toru is trying not to live in the shadow of his past... to move on with his new life... but, the harder he tries, he finds himself being pulled in by Fujishima.

(Source: DMP)

title: 8 Man
synopsis:
Murdered by criminals, Detective Yokoda's body is retrieved by Professor Tani and taken to his laboratory. There, Tani performs an experiment that has failed seven times; Yokoda is the latest subject to have his life force transferred into an android body. For the first time, the experiment succeeds. Yokoda is reborn as the armor-skinned android 8 Man, able to dash at impossible speeds, as well as shape-shift into other people. He shifts himself into Yokoda, this time christening himself as "Hachiro Azuma". He keeps this identity a secret, known only to Tani and his police boss Chief Tanaka. Even his girlfriend Sachiko and friend Ichiro do not know he is an android. As 8-Man, Hachiro fights crime (even bringing his murderers to justice).

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Intoxicated East Wind
synopsis:
10 years of unrequited love, 10 years of yearning, 10 years of waiting.
Was it all in vain? 
Yan Zhi pulled out of Zhao Fei Ying's arms and stood in front of him. 
He slowly striped his clothing.
One centimeter after one centimeter, he slowly revealed his untouched snow white skin in front of Zhao Fei Ying.

I, Leng Yan Zhi, here by vow------- to stay by my brother for as long as I live, until he is bored and tired of my existence.

Is it possible for the deeply passionate Leng Yan Zhi to receive his brother's love?

(Source: MU)

title: Hakoiri no Musume
synopsis:
Tamako, who has lead a sheltered life all her life, wants to attend a university in Tokyo to follow her boyfriend there but is opposed by her grandfather. So she plans a fake engagement with Noriyuki in exchange for her grandfather's financial support to his family's shop while both he and she gets to study in Tokyo.

(Source: The Lemon Teddy Bear)

title: Da Zhu Zai
synopsis:
The Great Thousand World. It is a place where numerous planes intersect, a place where many clans live and a place where a group of lords assemble. The Heavenly Sovereigns appear one by one from the Lower Planes and they will all display a legend that others would desire as they pursue the road of being a ruler in this boundless world.

In the Endless Fire Territory that the Flame Emperor controls, thousands of fire blazes through the heavens.

Inside the Martial Realm, the power of the Martial Ancestor frightens the heaven and the earth.

At the West Heaven Temple, the might of the Emperor of a Hundred Battles is absolute.

In the Northern Desolate Hill, a place filled with thousands of graves, the Immortal Owner rules the world.

A boy from the Northern Spiritual Realm comes out, riding on a Nine Netherworld Bird, as he charges into the brilliant and diverse world. Just who can rule over their destiny of their path on becoming a Great Ruler? In the Great Thousand World, many strive to become a Great Ruler.

title: Otokujuku Gaiden: Kurenai!! Onnajuku

synonyms: Otoku Juku Gaiden: Kurenai!! Onna Juku
Otokojuku Side Story: Crimson!! Women's Private School
alternative_titles.ja: 男塾外伝 紅!! 女塾

synopsis:
Thirty years after World War III, Japan has suffered immense damage from a dangerous weapon known as a "Man Bomb" which affected nearly all Japanese men and rendered them unable to fight, with other men giving their lives for their country. Heihachi Edajima, an Otokojuku veteran and survivor of the Man Bomb, starts up a new facility known as Onnajuku, a tough combat training facility, and begins training several Japanese women to fight for their country.

The manga follows Momoko Tsurugi, a descendant of former protagonist Momotarou Tsurugi, who recently enrolls in Onnajuku. As spirited and tenacious as her ancestor, Momoko's catchphrase is "As a woman, I ain't dying! I, Momoko Tsurugi, will show you my burning youth!"

(Source: ANN)

title: Hitofuri, Tsurete
synopsis:
1-7. Hitofuri, Tsurete
8-12. Warashi to Tasuke
13. Natsu wa Mizugi de

2. Osananajimi Nochi Otokonoko [Sano Airi]
3. Nishiki-kun no Nasugamama Bangai-hen [Shiraishi Yuki]
4. S Kare Revenge: Kyou kara Watashi ni Hizamazuke [Maki Kyouko]
5. xx Kiss, Satsueichuu! [Yuzuki Soyona]
6. Akuma na Shitsuji no Shitsukekata [Odagiri Nagisa]
7. Papa ni wa Naisho de Tsuresatte [Oogi Sae]
8. Osananajimi ga Sexy sugite Komaru. [Seta Nanami]
9. Momoiro Ome-chen★ Bangai-hen [Souda Momo]

alternative_titles.ja: 蜜恋絵巻～快感たいむすりっぷ～

title: So I Married an Anti-Fan
synopsis:
Modern-day woman Geunyoung Lee struggles to make ends meet working as a lowly reporter for a magazine. She lives with a friend and barely scratches out her rent every month. On the other hand, male sex symbol Joon Hoo currently rides on top of the world. His movies become instant hits. Corporations clamber all over each other to pay for his product endorsements. Women adore him. His public image stays squeaky clean...that is, until one night he runs into Geunyoung at a club. Lee accidentally snaps a photo of Joon dumping a heartbroken young girl. He suddenly goes nuclear trying to protect his image, forcing Lee's magazine to fire her. Now, despite losing her job and apartment, the intrepid young woman has taken on a new mission in life: Destroy Joon Hoo at all costs.

(Source: Netcomics)

title: Aka no Haikyo
synopsis: Minato Yuzuriha suddenly lost her parents. Without a single relative, she must return to her father's birthplace, a village, where she can finish school. But she still can't recover from the sadness. And then, on a mountain road, she meets a boy in a garden of roses with an aroma as of blood.

title: Mou Ikkai

synonyms: Once Again, I'd Like to Love You

synopsis: A high school girl runs into her ex-boyfriend at a train station and the two reconnect.

title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Rush Duel: Yarouze! Rush Duel!!

synonyms: Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Yarouze! Rush Duel!!
Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Let's do it! Rush Duel!!
alternative_titles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王ラッシュデュエル やろうぜ!ラッシュデュエル!!

synopsis:
An introduction to the new Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game Rush Duel, using the Rush Duel Starter Decks.

Yuuga challenges Luke to a Rush Duel while Student Council President Gakuto explains the rules to Romin as they watch the first three turns of their exciting Duel. You can follow along and learn the rules of Rush Duel too! Rush Duel is a fast, exciting, new method of Dueling that's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat! Rush! Rush! Go! Rush!

(Source: Mangadex)

title: Neko to Wakagashira
synopsis:
Kengou is in love with Busamen, Touma is jealous of Busamen and Busamen is scared and hungry.
A crossover between Busamen and Hakujin to Kurobotan!

(Source: Ikemen Scans)

title: Tanuki to Kitsune to Satogurashi

alternative_titles.ja: たぬきときつねと里暮らし

synopsis:
Tired of working and of the city life, Yasuha Furuhata moves out to the countryside where she meets two girls with the features of a tanuki and a fox.

(Source: Shueisha, translated)

title: Bijin Dorobou
synopsis:
Shinonome Mizuki is a popular and stylish girl. She's also dating the coolest guy in school, Satoru-kun. But, Mizuki has a secret. She actually has a very plain face and has to wake up at 5:00 am everyday to make herself into a stylish person! However, her secret is in danger of being exposed when the son of her father's company manager, Odagiri Rin, comes to her house. Due to complications, they have to live together!

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)

title: Mangetsu Monogatari
synopsis:
After a scandal got him kicked out of his position at court, Takaaki's been idling the days away at his manor, impulsive and bored. Then one day his friend Naruhito stops by and tells him an insane story about the most beautiful woman alive—and drags him off in his attempt to win her heart. Tagging along, Takaaki soon realizes that the "Princess" isn't exactly who she (he!?) seems to be. Who exactly is Princess Kaguya, and what is the dark secret behind her (his!?) past?

(Source: Storm in Heaven)

title: Tsuki Kagerou
synopsis:
Taishō era. The interval between Meiji and Shōwa. A season where yellow and red petals swoop down from the trees.

A young man comes down from the Imperial city, clinging to a large trunk, faintly smiling at the sight of the streets, a suitable young man indeed.

Just as told by his father, he reached to this town to help for an autumn festival. Walking down the streets brings a surge of nostalgia.

Encounter with a girl. Two girls.
As days drift by, the young man soon links with one of the girls. Not a love by chance. It was a fated love.

Was it the reason this young man was made to come to this town?

(Source: VNDB)

title: Yankee Kanojo to Kozukuri Gakuen Life

alternative_titles.ja: ヤンキー彼女と子作り学園ライフ

synopsis:
The protagonist was a weak guy, so when beautiful yankee Ayame rescued him he was smitten. When he found out one day that she was may be forced into an arranged marriage, he mustered the courage to tell her how he felt. Impressed by his moment of manliness she said, "If you really like me you'll steal me!" It was the touching start of a vulnerable, awkward, schizophrenically emotional love life.

(Source: dlsite)

title: Kimi no Iru Basho - Real x Fake
synopsis:
Mitsuha is sick of her stupid friends and boring school life. All she wants is to be left in peace. One day by mistake she becomes penpals with Haru, whom she doesn't know at all. Only with him can she be honest. There's one guy in Mitsuha's school who's just the way Mitsuha would like to be - cool, a little scary and above all - alone. One day she meets him in a bus... What will happen next?

(Source: Osuwari Team)

title: Saseum, I'm a Deer
synopsis: In Korea, the deer is considered as the symbol of purity and innocence. Ria wishes she were a deer... Torn between her love for her protective brother and her desire to fend for herself, she'll need to learn how to make her own choices, as well as her brother will. Not only does Rin meets a girl who falls head over heels for him, but he also starts to feel growing an odd interest in guys...(Source: Shoujo Manga Maniac)

title: Mask: Kamen no Jouji
synopsis:
Ria works as a hostess, and she longs for the day when the owner, Himi Kyouji, and herself can finally be together. On the other hand, 10 years ago, when Kyouji forced Ria’s beloved parents to commit suicide and robbed her of her happiness, she planned to get her revenge. However, after she is hugged by him, what will happen to her revenge?!

(Source: Midnight Scans)

title: Romance ni wa Hodotooi
synopsis:
In high school, Arata fell for a British girl. A salaryman now, he's reunited with that person, but they're actually a man?!

(Source: MU)

title: Boku wa Aku de Ii, Omae wo Koroseru nara.

synonyms: I Don't Care If I Become Evil, I Want to Kill You
alternative_titles.ja: ぼくは悪でいい、おまえを殺せるなら。

title: Utsushimi no Hana
synopsis:
When he was a child, Tasuna’s father told him to seek his old apprentice if Tasuna ever desired to learn his father’s metal engraving craft.  However, Tasuna was later sold to a noble and sexually abused. Desperate and with nothing to lose, Tasuna flees deep into the mountains in search of the old apprentice.  Exhausted, Tasuna collapses and later awakens in a cave with a strange man named Azeri.  Tasuna soon realizes Azeri is the man he’s searching for and begs to become his apprentice.  

(Source: shinkeikaku)

alternative_titles.ja: クインテット・ファンタズム

title: Ore no Shitsuji (♀) ga Iketeiru

alternative_titles.ja: 俺の執事（♀）がイケている

synopsis:
Rui lacks the feminine features needed as a hostess, so she instead dresses up as a guy to go earn some fast money as a host. Her friend Sera had told her to not leave the place with clients, but before she realized it, she was taken to a hotel. While trying to get away from the client, Touma buys her for one million dollars, chasing away the client. But, Rui's not quite free to go yet. What will Touma do with the Rui now that he has bought her?

(Source: MU)

title: Iinari!! Kyuuketsuhime
synopsis:
Lucrezia is a vampire from outside of Japan. She is only in the are to seek the "Supreme Blood." But that blood is in a workaholic girl who can only thing about making enough expenses to help her family out. But when they meet and a brawl breaks out with the help of a charm Lucrezia loses a majority of her powers and grows younger. So now to recover her power and have the supreme blood, Lucrezia must work to earn that blood. But what how will someone who doesn't know a lot of worldly knowledge and does things on her own do?

(Source: Mangahere)

title: Hataraku Hitozuma-san
synopsis: Ten years after getting married and giving birth a secretary returns to work.

title: Dazzled By You
synopsis:
For Yeonsu, writing is all there is to life. Her workaholic tendencies prevent her from properly eating, sleeping, exercising...until one day, she wakes up and finds herself in a hospital room. A clear warning from the doctor about her physical health and a desperation to come up with the plot of her next story forces Yeonsu to seek the help of Gyeol, a fellow patient. Falling in love with an athletic stranger may seem like the stuff of romance novels, but reality can often be crazier than fiction...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: 8th Circle Mage Reborn
synopsis:
Henry Morris was an 8-circled wizard who was a legend—one of the founding fathers who helped his friend become the king of a unified empire. After the son took over the throne, Henry was executed with the false accusation of leading a rebellion against the empire. He then wakes up in the body of young Henry Morris, the eldest of a baron family, who also happened to have the same name. Henry turns his life around by relearning magic and also swordsmanship in order to become the first magic swordsman, all for the sake of revenge.

(Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Gozen Reiji ni Kuchizuke wo

alternative_titles.ja: 午前零時にくちづけを

synopsis:
Aoki Karin has always wanted to be a bartender because of an American movie she watched when she was a child. On her 20th birthday, her friends take her out to a bar to celebrate. There she meets Shiino Takumi, who is much cooler and more handsome than the bartender from the film. Alas! Karin believes she has found the one... until she finds out that maybe she jumped into this a bit too fast.

Contains extras "Crazy Only For You" and "Striving Little Devil". 

(Source: Wild*Hope)

alternative_titles.ja: フラワーナイトガール

title: Manga Science
synopsis:
Manga Science was serialized in a science magazine for elementary school students. From the cutting edge to the more familiar science, unique characters make it all easy to understand. This popular science manga can be enjoyed by all regardless of age.

(Source: JManga)

title: Strobe Light
synopsis: In the night train, Tadashi Hamazaki revives how he met his ex-girlfriend Mika Machida... in an extraordinary way.

title: Shitasaki no Netsu

alternative_titles.en: Warmth of the Tip of the Tounge

synopsis: Jun finds himself making a chocolate cake for the first time in his life for his lover, this is a cute one shot story about their Valentines day together.

title: X-Tai Shinsho
synopsis: Sugita Genpaku made a contract with the demon in exchange for the ability to cure any disease. But if he doesn’t find someone to treat within the time limit, his soul will be taken!

alternative_titles.ja: アリス イン デッドリースクール

synonyms: Kimi wa Seiya ni Uso wo Tsuku

synopsis:
1. Oresama☆Kiss
2. Sono Koi Osusume Dekimasen
3. Ore no Tenshi wo Dakishimete
4. Kimi wa Seiya ni Uso wo Tsuku
5. Ohimesama☆Kiss

title: Fuson na Hana wo Aisureba
synopsis:
1-2. Fuson na Hana wo Aisureba
3-5. Lonely Butler
6. Chuuken Jeremy

title: Hatori-kun Chi no Yoru wa Himitsu

alternative_titles.en: The Secret Night of Hatori's Room
alternative_titles.ja: 羽鳥くんちの夜はひみつ

synopsis:
I have been under care in celebrity house with three hot guys sibling!? against sweet temptation this heart pounding is unstoppable!?

(Source: Chibi Manga)

title: Akugyaku Kishidan: Sono Elf, Kyoubou ni Tsuki

alternative_titles.ja: 悪逆騎士団 そのエルフ、凶暴につき

title: Dakara Kimi ga Itoshinda.

alternative_titles.ja: だからキミが愛しんだ。

synopsis:
Wealthy picture book writer Ritsu and orphan hairdresser Azusa are lovers. They just started living together in a small house. Yet Azusa is cold towards Ritsu, who only wants to spoil him rotten. But is Ritsu the only one hanging on to their relationship...?

(Source: MU)

title: Drag-On Dragoon: Story Side

alternative_titles.ja: ドラッグオンドラグーン　ストーリーサイド

synopsis:
Drag-On Dragoon Story Side is a novelization of the first Drakengard. It seems to follow a branch similar to branch A. 

[Taken from Drakengard Wiki]

title: Kimagure na Jaguar
synopsis:
After three months away, Soujun, a famed guitarist, returns to Arata, editor of a well-regarded music magazine. Despite his talent, Soujun has cut himself off from the Japanese music scene. Unable to settle down, he bounces back and forth between countries, often leaving his longtime lover Arata behind. Arata knows that about Soujun, but can't help wishing he'd come back for good, to stay by his side, hold him and make love with him... The adult love between these two men flickers between Arata's admiration for Soujun's immense talent, his sense of inferiority, and the freedom and possessiveness that comes from affection.

(Source: Renta!)

title: Toki no Netsu
synopsis:
Seto had no idea what he was getting into when he entered a relationship with Yamato, a masochist he met online. Due to some past trauma, Yamato has developed twisted sexual desires that Seto finds increasingly harder to satisfy. As their relationship progresses, Seto wonders if he will ever be enough for Yamato and whether he can help the younger man break free from his past.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Saikyou Shoku "Ryuu Kishi" kara Shokyuu Shoku "Hakobiya" ni Natta no ni Naze ka Yuusha-tachi kara Tayoraretemasu

synopsis:
The barbequed meat shop owner, Yotsuya-san continues to harass the part time worker Matsuda-kun saying “Your smell is special”. At first Matsuda-kun is baffled by this, but gradually he develops a liking towards Yotsuda-san…!?

Also includes a spin off of “17-sai no Hisoka na Yokujou” called “Anata ga Hoshii."

(Source: Bakeneko Scanslation)

"It's not enough, so... give me more...!" My hole throbs impatiently. I can't stop myself from crying out when he teases it... I don't want to be a needy bitch like this...!

title: Tensei Shirayukihime wa Doku Ringo wo Tabetakunai

synonyms: The Reincarnated Snow White Doesn’t Want to Eat the Poisoned Apple
alternative_titles.ja: 転生白雪姫は毒リンゴを食べたくない

synopsis:
When she was five years old, Snow White recalled her past life as a Japanese high schooler who knew of a fairy tale about a queen who wanted the death of a princess with skin as white as snow, lips as red as blood, and hair as black as ebony—and realizes that she has reincarnated as that princess! Ever since then, she has been training in hopes of avoiding the grim future that awaits her.

On the day of reckoning, Snow White escapes the castle before the queen calls for the hunter... only to fall onto the man himself! Will the reincarnated Snow White be able to avoid her deadly fate in this isekai spin of the classic fairy tale?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Kimi no Kao ni Sasu Kage

synonyms: The Shadow Cast On Your Face

synopsis:
Miwa confesses his feelings to his friend Katou, but in response, Katou introduces Miwa to his gay friend Hashina. Miwa is shocked, and rejects Hashina, but that just makes Hashina fall in love creating an unrequited love triangle. Miwa finds comfort in Hashina, but will he ever be able to let go of his feelings for Katou?

(Source: MU)

title: Cinderella Tokkyuu
synopsis:
Mari is to be headed to another country to visit her friend who became a queen. When Mari arrives there, things starts to get mysterious as there is an attempt to kill the royal family. Who is behind the plot to kill them? 

(Source: MU)

title: Signal
synopsis:
The special cocktail that can only be ordered once a month, is the code to be able to spend a night with the owner of the pub, Ashihara. Introduced to Ashihara by his senpai in his company, Murakami is totally obsessed with Ashihara. How long can he withstand the torture of being one among many others?

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)

Another story of the tale of Tenjun Merkmal, another piece foretelling the end of the world is unraveled.

title: Chousekitan Maze☆Bakunetsu Jikuu
synopsis:
A girl wakes up to find her room a mess. She realizes that she has partially lost her memory. All she can remember is that her name is Maze, and that she's now in a strange world. Her house landed on some creatures just like Dorothy in The Wizard of Oz. Where she meets a girl named Princess Mill who is on the run from the "Jaina Holy Group"; Maze also soon realizes that at night she transforms into a man. Maze and Mill meet more companions on their journey and become embroiled in a war to defeat Jaina and raise Mill back to the throne of Bartonia.

(Source: MU)

title: Henyoku no Drops
synopsis:
The year is 3015, the ocean covers 90% of the planet, and it is normal for humans to fly in the sky. People who cannot fly are called "Drops" (the old generation), and Tsubasa is one of them. She lives in a world where there are almost no stairs or ladders, even though the buildings and space between floors is getting higher and farther.

On her first day of the high school she chose (because it had stairs), Tsubasa Fukami jumps off a landing to see if she can fly, and collides with Ren Takatsuki who was also using the stairs...

(Source: Comic Natalie, translated)

alternative_titles.ja: ミモザ館でつかまえて

synopsis:
The protagonist Haruka is a new teachter in a secondary school. She decides to settle herself in the Mimosa pension. The owner is young man who offers her a low-rent on one condition: helping to prepare dinner every evening. Haruka accepts, but is astonished when she finds out the next day that Areira, the young man, is a student of her class.

(translated from: shoujo-manga.net)

title: Shiritsu Ajikari Gakuen
synopsis:
Ryouma 's sister opens a restaurant and one day some thugs came in their store to eat her food and left without paying. Ryouma and those thugs ended up fighting using knife as a weapon. During the fight some mysterious guy threw in a can of beer, and made those thugs lose their balance and lose the fight. They ran away.

It turned out that a man who helped Ryouma is an old man. When Ryouma thanks him, that old man challenges him for a knife fight. He introduced himself as a principle from Ajikari Academy.

Ryouma's sister doesn't want them to fight but turned out the fight is about who is the fastest one that can peel an apple. The old man said that if he won, Ryouma must do what the old man said. Ryouma lose to the old man and now he has to enter Ajikari Academy. Ryouma's experience with various kind of food is about to start from now.

title: Suzu Rogu
synopsis:
On January 3rd, 2097, a collision with a celestial object basically destroyed human civilization. Seventy years later, human survivors are still living in space, unable to return to their home planet. Some humans, called "Divers" are able to project an avatar to the earth in order to salvage information from earth-based computer networks.

Suzuro is a 14-year-old freelance diver of incredible skill, but only a C-rank due to age restrictions. She works in a salvage ship with her pilot Ginga, who keeps the ship out of flying debris while she's connected to earth, and her assistant Shimugi. It's not only space debris colliding with the ship that could kill Suzuro while diving, there are also dangers waiting on earth that could kill her, just by interacting with her avatar. Suzuro must be certain that the cases she takes are worth the danger!

(Source: MU)

The Western Kingdom of Fortinu is in a dire situation due to the incursion of the Demon Lord. The captain of the female knights, Klinfeid, fearful of her body being sullied and the long history of the House of Laz being smeared, decides to kill everyone including herself before the orcs get to them! However, the newly appointed princess Luka is having none of that, and decides to run away from the female knights. What will happen to her?!

Shun Imai is a shy, quiet boy who struggles with the idea that he may be gay. One day, he is found reading a BL novel by his classmate Kounosu, who calls him out on it. Although Imai is surprised and anxious, Kounosu says "I want to know more about you"... This starts a tender relationship that takes place over time, pulling at your heart strings.

title: Kyoudai tte Ii na
synopsis:
A shady businessman is strolling into an empty train carriage—well, nearly empty. Sitting together are a brother and sister, both in elementary school. Regardless of all the open seats, the shady businessman decides to sit opposite the young pair. As a hardcore lolicon, he cannot believe how attractive the youthful girl is. 

Not wanting to miss a moment of this lovely scene, the businessman—behind the disguise of reading a newspaper—pulls out his camera and begins recording the view. But little does he know that the interactions between these two siblings will soon escalate to something much more inappropriate...

synopsis:
"Andou-kun, good morning ♪"

"Asakura-san, mornin'..."

(I got the seat next to the most beautiful girl in the school. A person who is willing to greet a loner like me, what a kind person she is. But in any case it's just lip service, she'll probably find me a bother if I start talking to her.)

"..."

"..."

(Even though I tried to greet him, why won't he talk to meee!! I can't talk about light novels to anyone besides Andou-kun, so please talk to meee!!)

This is that sort of school rom-com.

(Source: Kakuyomu, translated)

title: Wasurerarenai
synopsis:
From ShoujoMagic:
A haunting manga that will stay with you always... It is truly an unforgettable story. Nae and Ryou have been going out for almost three years but then something changes... Ryou suddenly breaks up with Nae, leaving her at loss. Nae thought he had a change of heart, but as she found out that it's actually not the case... 

This is a very moving story of love and loss.

title: Hisho to Yajuu
synopsis:
The president of Kyouei Group, Kyoujima Eiichi, is making others jealous with his successful career and passionate love life. His secretary, Togawa Akihiko, is an honest man and has been secretly in love with him. Includes a Las Vegas working trip that shocked the secretary with the president's past...

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)

title: Strawberry Shortcakes
synopsis:
Set in modern-day Tokyo, Sweet Cream and Red Strawberries is a series of vignettes, presented as episodes in the lives of four women. Touko and Chihiro are roommates in a one-bedroom apartment. Akiyo pines after her college friend while making a living as a prostitute. Suzuki lives alone and wanders through her daily estoutine wondering about love. Except for Touko and Chihiro, the characters in these stories don't intersect. Instead, their lives unravel independent from one another in isolated sections of the city. Themes like emotional strength reoccur throughout the book as the women suffer from jealousy, loneliness and unrequited love. Despite their close quarters, Touko and Chihiro keep their feelings to themselves, quietly coming undone behind their calm smiles.

(Source: Publishers Weekly)

title: Hana Meguri Goyou!
synopsis:
A series of short stories. The main one is about a grandmother telling a child, Hana, the story of the princess of the moon, Kaguya. The second one explores further into the story after grandmother's story is told.

Under the influence of alcohol, they went straight into a hotel and Kyosuke had sex for the first time. Their physical compatibility was the best however... After that, Kyosuke got irritated with Subaru's attitude and decided never to see him again. But, it turns out they live in the same sharehouse?!

(Source: Frontier Works, translated)

synopsis: Houshi Saito, is a 25 years-old "cherry boy" whose wife had run away from him on their wedding day. One day, a beautiful girl called Momoka Kiyozumi came to him, and confessed that she fell in love with him at the first sight on that wedding day. At the same time, he was employed to an English conversation school called "PEACH". Run by a woman called Chieri Sakura, his job was to get an "extension contract for the lessons via falling in love with the female students and have sexual relationships". With the world filled with women and lust opened in front of him, Houshi's life went on... (from Baka-Updates)

Brave warriors of the Tangut and a strange religious army from the west battled for a rumoured sacred item. Conflicts, conspiracies, and religious struggles - moving in the heart of the battlefield, the "untouchable war painter" Tao Hui paints nothing but the truth!

title: Hotel Helheim

alternative_titles.ja: ホテル ヘルヘイム

synopsis:
Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!

The story starts when his aunt tells him about a part-time job. With his childhood and new friends, he enjoys his life there...
